text:
I created an enhanced version of the JDBCAppender. It contains the following changes:

- uses batch update (performance improvement)
- Added JDNI lookup support. More robust then specifying JDBC parameters in the log4j config files 
- fixed the NullPointerExceptin when using with AsyncAppender and LogManager.close() was called.
- updated the JavaDoc with examples
- escape colons to two colons
- preserved Java 1.0 compatibility and compatibility previous version of JDBCAppender (all method signatures are intact including protected methods)

I attach the updated version, and hope it can be added to the next release.
creator: 1.sz.peter@gmail.com
